item.title: CVE-2018-2458|2024-08-05T04:21:33.974Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: Under certain conditions, Crystal Report using SAP Business One, versions 9.2 and 9.3, connection type allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.
